metadata.title: CVE-2022-48639 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: sched: fix possible refcount leak in tc_new_tfilter()tfilter_put need to be called to put the refount got by tp->ops->get toavoid possible refcount leak when chain->tmplt_ops != NULL andchain->tmplt_ops != tp->ops.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
